Name: maximize_velocity
Description: Maximize historical team throughput measured via max_velocity.

Name: maximize_average_story_points
Description: Maximize average story points completed across sprints.

Name: minimize_total_sprint_effort
Description: Minimize total planned effort within sprint backlogs.

Name: minimize_open_tasks
Description: Minimize number of tasks remaining on active sprint boards.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize cumulative severity of current blockers.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize reported team satisfaction from retrospectives.

Name: minimize_feature_effort
Description: Minimize total estimated effort of selected features per release.

Name: maximize_story_priority_value
Description: Bias selection toward higher-priority user stories.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Prefer smaller tasks to improve flow and reduce cycle time.

Name: maximize_roadmap_objectives
Description: Maximize achievement toward roadmap objectives proxy via milestones count.

Name: maximize_product_backlog_freshness
Description: Favor recently updated backlog content to keep scope relevant.

Name: minimize_cycle_instability
Description: Minimize goal miss indicators using achievement_of_goal as proxy.
